prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with ethereal wings and sharp claws that embodies the essence of shadows.
I want a dragon-type Pokemon inspired by legendary creatures, featuring intricate patterns and vibrant colors.
Generate an otherworldly Pokemon that has a blend of ghostly and dragon-like traits, with a haunting aura.
Make a Pokemon that resembles an ancient guardian, combining elements of darkness and grace in its design.
Imagine a powerful mythical Pokemon with a fierce appearance and a commanding presence, capable of controlling realms.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that merges the elegance of a dragon with the mysterious nature of a ghost.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with a majestic form and captivating colors that can inspire awe and fear.
